articles.title: American rapper Takeoff shot dead in Houston - Punch Newspapers
articles.content:
American rapper, Kirshnik Ball popularly known as Takeoff, a member of the hip hop trio, Migos which includes Quavo and Offset, has been shot dead in Houston.

articles.title: New York Has a New Pay Transparency Law. How Much You Can Make on Wall Street. - Barron's
articles.description: This law, effective Nov. 1, will lift the mask on salary ranges. Companies including JP Morgan Chase, American Express, Citigroup, and UBS have already complied.
articles.content: Wall Street salaries will no longer be shrouded in mystery, starting Tuesday, Nov. 1. That is thanks to a New York salary transparency law that requires employers to share salary ranges for roles bas… [+312 chars]

articles.title: US responds to backlash over security threat alerts in SA and Nigeria - News24
articles.description: US State Department spokesperson Edward "Ned" Price says the country has "no higher priority than the safety and security of American citizens around the world".
articles.content:
• Last week the US issued security threat alerts in Nigeria and South Africa.

  • In SA, it almost amounted to a diplomatic tiff.
